name: City of Bones
description:
City of Bones revolves around the exploits of  Detective Santiago de la Cruz in a peculiar city where conspiracy theories, urban legends, and ghosts have more truth to them than he'd care to admit.

With an uncanny ability to converse with the dead and predict misfortunes, he has long since grown used to the oddities of his home...until......

~Main Character~

Santiago de la Cruz--Age: 24 years old. A perpetually tired detective who is incredibly fed up with the increasingly bizarre and increasingly supernatural cases he undertakes. Unfortunately, many of those involved wind up dead by the end.

---

This  is a short horror game created on RPG Maker VX Ace for IGMC 2018. It requires you to install the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play!
